title: Agricultural Antibiotic Overuse
description: Antibiotics in livestock run off into water supplies. Remove 1 bad bacteria from a random zone, but AMR +1.
educationalFact: 70% of antibiotics sold globally are used in livestock.

title: Pandemic Panic
description: Public fear leads to antibiotic hoarding. AMR +2.
educationalFact: During health scares, antibiotic sales spike even though they don't work on viruses.

title: Public Health Campaign
description: Awareness rises! Remove 1 bad bacteria from all zones with more than 2 bad bacteria.
educationalFact: Educational campaigns reduce inappropriate antibiotic prescriptions.

title: Contaminated Water Supply
description: Bacteria spread through the water system. Add 1 bad bacteria to 3 random zones.
educationalFact: Antibiotic-resistant bacteria spread through contaminated water.

title: Hospital Outbreak
description: A resistant strain spreads. Add 2 bad bacteria to the zone with most good bacteria.
educationalFact: Hospital-acquired infections often involve antibiotic-resistant bacteria.

title: New Antibiotic Discovery
description: Scientists develop a new treatment! Remove 2 bad bacteria from a random zone. No AMR increase.
educationalFact: The last entirely new class of antibiotics was discovered in 1987.

title: International Travel Season
description: Tourists spread bacteria globally. Add 1 bad bacteria to 4 random zones.
educationalFact: International travel spreads antibiotic-resistant bacteria between countries.

title: Probiotic Research Breakthrough
description: New probiotic strains discovered! Add 2 good bacteria to the zone with fewest good bacteria.
educationalFact: Scientists are researching probiotics to fight antibiotic-resistant infections.

title: School Hygiene Program
description: Children learn proper hand washing! Remove 1 bad bacteria from 2 random zones.
educationalFact: School-based hygiene programs can reduce absenteeism by 50%.

title: Contaminated Food Recall
description: Tainted products reach consumers. Add 2 bad bacteria to 2 random zones.
educationalFact: Food contamination causes 600 million illnesses worldwide yearly.

title: Vaccination Drive
description: Mass vaccination prevents infections! Add 1 good bacteria to all zones.
educationalFact: Vaccines prevent millions of infections, reducing the need for antibiotics.

title: Antibiotic Awareness Week
educationalFact: World Antibiotic Awareness Week promotes responsible antibiotic use.

title: Superbug Mutation
description: A dangerous mutation appears! Convert 2 good bacteria to bad in random zones.
educationalFact: Bacteria can share resistance genes between different species.

title: Clean Water Initiative
description: New water treatment installed! Remove all bad bacteria from one random zone.
educationalFact: Access to clean water prevents bacterial infections effectively.
